name: 3D Bunker Warfare - Military Turret Defense Shooter Games FREE
name_original: 3D Bunker Warfare - Military Turret Defense Shooter Games FREE
description:
Man your gun turret, you’re about to defend your base from waves of enemy combatants. Incredible heart-pumping excitement awaits! Can you fend off the militants long enough for your chopper to arrive? Get money to buy new guns and power-ups to battle the enemy. Upgrade your firepower, radar and stamina! Hot military action is at your fingertips!

Features:
-3 Realistic 3D environments
-Selectable Characters
-Multiple Guns for purchase
-Earn money to buy powerups
